achievements: Third Vice President of the United States
Served in the Continental Army during the American Revolutionary War
Killed Alexander Hamilton in a duel
Created numerous successful television series including 'Beverly Hills, 90210', 'Dynasty', and 'Charlie's Angels'
Known as one of the most prolific television producers of all time
Right fielder for the New York Yankees
American League home run record holder (62 home runs in a season)
Won Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for 'The Social Network'
Created popular television shows including 'The West Wing', 'Sports Night', and 'The Newsroom'
